sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; const SubscriptionManagement = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); const [selectedFilter, setSelectedFilter] = useState('all'); const subscriptionStats = [ { title: 'Total Subscribers', value: '0', change: '0%', icon: 'ðŸ‘¥', color: 'text-blue-600' }, { title: 'Active Subscriptions', value: '0', change: '0%', icon: 'âœ…', color: 'text-green-600' }, { title: 'Monthly Revenue', value: 'â‚±0', change: '0%', icon: 'ðŸ’°', color: 'text-yellow-600' }, { title: 'Pending Renewals', value: '0', change: '0%', icon: 'â°', color: 'text-orange-600' } ]; const subscriptionPlans = [ { id: 'basic', name: 'Basic', price: 'â‚±2,500', subscribers: 0, revenue: 'â‚±0', status: 'active', features: ['Up to 5 properties', 'Basic analytics', 'Email support'] }, { id: 'pro', name: 'Professional', price: 'â‚±5,000', subscribers: 0, revenue: 'â‚±0', status: 'active', features: ['Up to 25 properties', 'Advanced analytics', 'Priority support', 'API access'] }, { id: 'enterprise', name: 'Enterprise', price: 'â‚±12,000', subscribers: 0, revenue: 'â‚±0', status: 'active', features: ['Unlimited properties', 'Enterprise analytics', '24/7 support', 'Custom integrations'] } ]; const subscribers = []; const revenueData = [ { month: 'Jan', basic: 0, pro: 0, enterprise: 0 }, { month: 'Feb', basic: 0, pro: 0, enterprise: 0 }, { month: 'Mar', basic: 0, pro: 0, enterprise: 0 }, { month: 'Apr', basic: 0, pro: 0, enterprise: 0 }, { month: 'May', basic: 0, pro: 0, enterprise: 0 }, { month: 'Jun', basic: 0, pro: 0, enterprise: 0 } ]; const renderOverview = () => (
{/* Stats Grid */}
{subscriptionStats.map((stat, index) => (

{stat.title}

{stat.value}

{stat.icon}
{stat.change} from last month
))}
{/* Plan Performance */}

Plan Performance

{subscriptionPlans.map((plan) => (

{plan.name}

{plan.price}
per month
Subscribers: {plan.subscribers}
Monthly Revenue: {plan.revenue}
Status: {plan.status}
    {plan.features.map((feature, index) => (
  • {feature}
    • ))}
))}
{/* Revenue Chart */}

Subscription Trends

{revenueData.map((data, index) => { const totalRevenue = data.basic + data.pro + data.enterprise; const maxRevenue = Math.max(...revenueData.map(d => d.basic + d.pro + d.enterprise)); return (
{/* Revenue Values */}
â‚±{totalRevenue.toLocaleString()}
Total Revenue
{/* Stacked Bar Chart */}
{/* Basic Plan - Blue */}
{/* Professional Plan - Green */}
{/* Enterprise Plan - Purple */}
{/* Month Label */}
{data.month}
{/* Plan Breakdown */}
Basic: â‚±{data.basic.toLocaleString()}
Pro: â‚±{data.pro.toLocaleString()}
Enterprise: â‚±{data.enterprise.toLocaleString()}
); })}
{/* Legend */}
Basic Plan
Professional Plan
Enterprise Plan
{/* Chart Summary */}
â‚±{revenueData[revenueData.length - 1].basic.toLocaleString()}
Basic Plan Revenue
{revenueData[revenueData.length - 1].basic > revenueData[0].basic ? '+' : ''} {((revenueData[revenueData.length - 1].basic - revenueData[0].basic) / revenueData[0].basic * 100).toFixed(1)}% from Jan
â‚±{revenueData[revenueData.length - 1].pro.toLocaleString()}
Professional Plan Revenue
{revenueData[revenueData.length - 1].pro > revenueData[0].pro ? '+' : ''} {((revenueData[revenueData.length - 1].pro - revenueData[0].pro) / revenueData[0].pro * 100).toFixed(1)}% from Jan
â‚±{revenueData[revenueData.length - 1].enterprise.toLocaleString()}
Enterprise Plan Revenue
{revenueData[revenueData.length - 1].enterprise > revenueData[0].enterprise ? '+' : ''} {((revenueData[revenueData.length - 1].enterprise - revenueData[0].enterprise) / revenueData[0].enterprise * 100).toFixed(1)}% from Jan
); const renderSubscribers = () => (
{/* Filters */}
{/* Subscribers Table */}
{subscribers.map((subscriber) => ( ))}
Subscriber Plan Status Properties Next Billing Revenue Actions
{subscriber.name}
{subscriber.company}
{subscriber.email}
 {subscriber.plan} {subscriber.status} {subscriber.properties} {subscriber.nextBilling} {subscriber.revenue}
); const renderBilling = () => (
{/* Billing Overview */}

Billing Overview

â‚±0
Monthly Recurring Revenue
â‚±0
Annual Recurring Revenue
0%
Retention Rate
â‚±0
Average Revenue Per User
{/* Recent Transactions */}

{subscribers.slice(0, 5).map((subscriber) => (
{subscriber.name.charAt(0)}
{subscriber.name}
{subscriber.company}
{subscriber.revenue}
{subscriber.plan}
Next: {subscriber.nextBilling}
{subscriber.status}
))}
); const renderSettings = () => (
{/* Plan Management */}

Plan Management

{subscriptionPlans.map((plan) => (

{plan.name} Plan

â‚±{plan.price} per month

))}

); return (
{/* Header */}

Subscription Management

Manage all property manager subscriptions

{/* Navigation Tabs */}
{/* Tab Content */} {activeTab === 'overview' && renderOverview()} {activeTab === 'subscribers' && renderSubscribers()} {activeTab === 'billing' && renderBilling()} {activeTab === 'settings' && renderSettings()}
); }; export default SubscriptionManagement;
